abilities.name: Mimic Octopus
abilities.description: Every {Stat1}, Mimics and copies an ability from another pet and performs its ability.

abilities.name: Seal
abilities.description: When selling pets, has a {Stat1} chance to get the pet back as its egg equivalent

abilities.name: Night Owl
abilities.description: All active pets gain an additional {Stat1} XP per second

abilities.name: Butterfly
abilities.description: Every {Stat1}, flies to a nearby fruit with 5+ mutations, removes all mutations from it and turns it Rainbow! Ignores favorited fruit.

abilities.name: Queen Bee
abilities.description: Every {Stat1}, flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying Pollinated mutation! Every {Stat2}, stings a random pet and advances its ability cooldown by {Stat3}

abilities.name: Raccoon
abilities.description: Every {Stat1}, goes to another player's plot and steals(duplicate) a random crop and gives it to you
